item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

3/4/2013's location will be: Indigo by the Water

Monday Happy Hours tend to be in New Haven to check out the local bar scene but I say let's break out and go to Milford and see Indigo by the Water! Edgy, upscale and centrally located, Indigo offers a gorgeous bar with everything you can imagine and a variety of seating throughout from comfy bar stools to intimate tables to couches and a fireplace to kick back and relax!

The owners are excited to welcome the Monday Happy Hour and are offering specials from 6pm-8pm. Buy One Get One Free drink specials apply to all well drinks, house wine and bottled beer for our group.

A variety of tapas are available to order and go well with anything you decide to drink. This amazing location is sure to thrill in both the winter and summer where the large deck offers views over the beautiful Milford Harbor.

Parking available next to Indigo or just past the entrance on the opposite side of the street.

Jennifer will host and will post her number in her RSVP.

Please RSVP for this event when able to Indigo a heads up.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

For more information about the Bar, please visit: http://indigobythewater.com/

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Parking is available behind Archie Moores or just past Indigo on the left side of the street. The entrance for the Archie Moore parking is on Factory Lane in between Archies and Indigo. There is a back set of stairs from the lot to get you to Indigo.
item.name: Happy Hour @ Indigo by the Water on March 4
